Ingredients:
1/2 cup margarine or butter
4 tablespoons cocoa
6 tablespoons milk
1 lb confectioners&#39; sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla

Directions
Bring margarine (or butter), cocoa, and milk to a boil.

Remove from heat and stir in confectioners&#39; sugar.

Add vanilla.

Pour on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven.
